project.description:
This job upload stca and stcv images from nightly build into S3 bucket in Orion. It also cleans up old images that are older than parameter

Pre-Requisite:
- orion-cli.tgz from s3://spirent-orion-artifacts/deploys/test must be extracted and installed (path to datautil must be in the PATH environment variable)
- jq must be installed
NOTE: ORION_TOKEN value used in this job is retrieved from jenkins.oriondev.net (it's configured as global environment variable there)

scm.projectOptions: noallwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

info.propertiesContent: IL_WORKSPACE=/home/spirent/jenkins-rel/workspace/release_il_centralboot_packaging FOLDER_ID=a31b64186ec24391a1482a92674610e4 APP_ID=e8c43606b3924efbaa86f82bc47dd279 CATEGORY=product-image STCA_NAME=stca STCV_NAME=stcv STCA_DESCRIPTION=Spirent TestCenter Anywhere STCV_DESCRIPTION=Spirent TestCenter Virtual STC_DESCRIPTION=Spirent TestCenter Application STC_NAME=STC BLL_ROOT_PATH=/gibson
